Flexible data tables with CSS Grid
description:
Now that we've launched, I can finally talk about the secret project I've been working on for the last two years. One interesting piece of the Teamwork CRM puzzle was the "list view".
It's a powerful page component which exists seven times in the app ‚Äî a table on steroids essentially. I could talk about it for days but I won't bore you. I'll focus on how we added a lot of flexibility with a few lines of CSS (Grid). Namely, how we lay out data-heavy tables, how we support resizing of columns, and more.
